name: Disaster-Zombie Shooter
description:
You were left to survive on an island full of zombies and powerful creatures. Zombies will be comming in waves and every wave is stronger then it was before. 

Your mission is to surpass them all and unlock the key to another part of the island.
With the help of the town shop you will earn the right to purchase amazing cars with different attributes, ammo, potions as well as a combination of different upgrades.

You will be carrying a personal backpack With it you can upgrade your weapon power, fire rate, use marvelous potions and more.

Game is presented as a third person zombie shooter game with survival mode. Test your skills and show them who is the best!
